snippet: Pun(s) on Wednesday by Lynn Lempel.
abstract: Pun(s) on Wednesday by Lynn Lempel.
lead_paragraph: WEDNESDAY'S PUZZLE - Today we welcome back Lynn Lempel, and while most of you know her as another Queen of Monday puzzles alongside Andrea Carla Michaels, she is, in reality thisclose to batting for the cycle. One Saturday grid, Ms. Lempel, and that title is yours as well.
